alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Christian; Crittenden; Hopkins; McLean; Muhlenberg; Webster (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 12:41PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Muhlenberg, eastern Crittenden, northeastern Christian, northeastern Caldwell, southeastern McLean, Hopkins and southern Webster Counties through 1230 PM CDT... At 1141 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Providence to near Nortonville to 12 miles south of Morgantown. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dawson Springs. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 90 and 127. Western Kentucky Parkway between Mile Markers 39 and 65. Pennyrile Parkway between Mile Markers 27 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Caldwell; Christian; Crittenden; Hopkins; McLean; Muhlenberg; Webster
